description:
Holly Heart and her amazing hard body is back, and today we push that body to it's limits. Holly learned what being helpless is really all about. She was pushed farther then she ever has before in a BDSM scene.
Back arched out, pulled up on tip toes, nipples pulled, pinched and stretched to their max. A 20lb. weight being pulled with a chain through and up her shaved cunt. That was the end result of the scene. And how we got there is interesting, very interesting!
title: Holly Heart
